00041 class Template extends AbstractClass
00042 {
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00044 
00046         const TAG_OPEN = '[';
00047         
00049         const TAG_CLOSE = ']';
00050         
00052         const NEWLINE = "\n";
00053 
00054 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00055 
00056     public static function BuildTag ( $tagName )
00064     {
00065         return self::TAG_OPEN. $tagName. self::TAG_CLOSE;
00066     } //----- End of BuildTag
00067     
00068     public function SetSkeleton ( $skeleton )
00076     {
00077         $this->skeleton = $skeleton;
00078     } //----- End of SetSkeleton

00091     
00092     public function SetTag ( $tagName , Template & $value )
00101     {
00102         $this->tags[ $this->BuildTag ( $tagName ) ] = $value;
00103     } //----- End of SetTag
00104     
00105     public function GetTag ( $tagName )
00117     {
00118         if ( $this->TagExists( $tagName ) )
00119         {
00120             return $this->tags[  $this->BuildTag ( $tagName ) ];
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             $errs = new Errors ( );
00125             
00126             $errs->Add( new TemplateError( TemplateError::TEMPLATE_TAG_INEXISTANT , 'The tag named '. $tag  . ' doesn\'t exist.' ) );
00127             
00128             return $errs;
00129         }
00130     } //----- End of GetTag
00131     
00132     public function AddToTag ( $tagName, $value )
00146     {
00147         if ( $this->TagExists( $tagName ) )
00148         {
00149                         $this->GetTag ( $tagName )->skeleton .= $value;
00150 
00151                         return null;
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155             $errs = new Errors ( );
00156             
00157             $errs->Add( new TemplateError( TemplateError::TEMPLATE_TAG_INEXISTANT , 'The tag named '. $tag . ' doesn\'t exist.' ) );
00158             
00159             return $errs;
00160         }
00161     } //----- End of AddToTag
00162     
00163     public function TagExists ( $tagName )
00173     {
00174         return isset ( $this->tags[ Template::BuildTag( $tagName ) ] );
00175     } //----- End of TagExists
00176     
00177     public function Generate( )
00186     {
00187                 $generated = $this->skeleton;
00188 
00189                 foreach ( $this->tags as $tag => $value )
00190                 // replace tags by value, generated by subtemplates...
00191                 {
00192                         // generation by hierarchy
00193                         $generated = str_replace ( $tag, $value->Generate(), $generated );
00194                 }
00195         
00196         return $generated;
00197     } //----- End of Generate
00198     
00199 //-------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructors
00200     public function __construct( )
00205     {
00206                 parent::__construct();
00207         
00208         $this->tags = array();
00209     } //---- End of __construct
00210          
00211     function __destruct( )
00215         {       
00216                 parent::__destruct();
00217         } //----- End of Destructor
00218   
00219 //---------------------------------------------------------- Magic Methods
00220         public function __ToString ()
00229         {
00230                 return $this->Generate ( );
00231         } // End of __ToString
